column44: Comments
Windy but no rain
RNS erosion, drop off more evident
RPO surf is up today
RKS beach very busy
RAB beach very busy
huge rain storm last night with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui, light rain while taking sample
huge rain storm last night with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui - no rain while sampling - water brown near shore, no rain while taking sample

huge rain storm last night with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui -  while taking sample saw minor flooding in parking lot diverted to beach, while there diverted water was not going into the ocean, light rain while taking sample
huge rain storm last night with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui, no rain while taking sample
huge rain storm last night with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui, light rain while taking sample, one dog noted on beach
huge rain storm last night with thunder, ligtning, winds - power outages all over Maui, no rain while taking sample (not in data sheet CM)
at Napili Bay sampled 20 yards north of usual testing site because of the shore break, misty rain while sampling
at Pohaku gave 4 cards to man who said he signed up on web site, may want to volunteer. will put up at Kahana, Napili, Canoe Beach - misty rain while sampling
Canoe Beach warning sign dated 11/2/17
brown water, lots of limu on rocks
no beach, brown water
upon return to lab replaced batteries in HQ40D meter
brown plume, 2 fishermen, upon return to lab replaced batteries in HQ40D meter
brown close to shore, upon return to lab replaced batteries in HQ40D meter
upon return to lab replaced batteries in HQ40D meter
lots of fishermen, upon return to lab replaced batteries in HQ40D meter
upon return to lab replaced batteries in HQ40D meter
lots of beach erosion
waves just outside Napili Bay 3-4 ft, only 2 ft where sample taken
access difficult due to severe erosion, large boulders at access point, and sandbags at hotel, requested review of site access with Dana - gathered 2 buckets of seawater
large particles in seawater made turbidity results more variable
choppy water
choppy water
very calm day for wind and waves, very rainy until yesterday
very calm day for wind and waves, very rainy until yesterday
very calm day for wind and waves, very rainy until yesterday, visitors asked what team was doing
very calm day for wind and waves, very rainy until yesterday, visitors asked what team was doing
very calm day for wind and waves, very rainy until yesterday, lifeguard asked about the water quality
very calm day for wind and waves, very rainy until yesterday
dark and dismal day, light rain, not sure about stream flow
dark and dismal day, light rain, not sure about stream flow
dark and dismal day, light rain, not sure about stream flow. parking has become tighter due to workmen shoring up beach to protect the hotel

watched workers previous day moving sand at Pohaku and clearing out drain

cloudier at airport beach with dark clouds.

light rain at Wahikuli, windier and higher waves.
rained in last 24 hours, dark clouds/rain while testing
rained in last 24 hours, sprinkling light rain while testing, lots of limu floating in water
rained in last 24 hours, stream flowing north of sample site
rained in last 24 hours, getting windier
rained in last 24 hours, sunny with light mist while testing, several fishermen set up
rained in last 24 hours, calm
Particularly big chunks in water contributing to variability in turbidity readings

Brown water near shore - CM checked stream to north which was running into ocean and very muddy, south swell, had trouble filtering nutrient sample and didn't get as large a filtered sample since first filter clogged and used a second filter to filter the last 10 ml
brown water only to about 10 feet from shore, 3 fishermen on the beach with 12 fishing poles set up in the surf, canoes going by
brown water - stream flowing into ocean just north of sample site
dead fish on beach, surf advisory flags up, surf churned up
occasional set of waves larger than '2' wave size
1 fisherman at Pohaku with 3 rods, light sprinkles
canoe practice
no idea about rain in last 24 hours
no idea about rain in last 24 hours, 2 people within 10 ft of sampler, presumably in the water though not stated in notes

no idea about rain in last 24 hours. brown streaks out in the ocean. on right and left side of sample area brown streaks were 2-3 ft off shore and the brown streak straight out from sample area was about 50 ft off shore. a stream flows into the ocean north of the sample site and stream water was connected to the ocean. But flow direction of stream water was not easy to determine: Trades appeared to push stream surface toward ocean and ocean waves appeared to move upstream (CM). Stream water looked clear, not like the brown streaks observed in the ocean.
no idea about rain in last 24 hours

no idea about rain in last 24 hours
no idea about rain in last 24 hours
no idea about rain in last 24 hours
no idea about rain in last 24 hours, Kukui nuts from the stream causing bad smell/water conditions. strong shore break, low tide
no idea about rain in last 24 hours. no waves, strong shore break
it rained in the last 24 hours
it rained in the last 24 hours
it rained in the last 24 hours, brown water 100 yards
it rained in the last 24 hours, brown red water, lots of debris/kukui nuts
it rained in the last 24 hours

not sure if it rained in the last 24 hours, sunny and no rain while there
not sure if it rained in the last 24 hours, sunny and no rain while there, water in channel but fairly clear, not much flow

2 inches stagnant water in nearby stream bed, no stream flow
batteries were replaced in turbidity meter, no stream flow
no stream flow into ocean, KS stream ocean water flowing into canal - greenish/brown water 1-2 feet high in canal
3 canoes in water about 100 feet out
light sprinkles of rain while sampling
strong steady winds (14-20 knots), 3-5 foot waves, and a high tide
RNS - strong waves breaking at shore, high tides, clear, sunny, light winds, low-lying clouds - used new BD syringes and usual disposable 0.2 micron filters
RPO - high surf almost to highway, brown water close to shore. clear, no wind, clouds over Molokini - used new BD syringes and usual disposable 0.2 micron filters
RKS - a little brownish water - used old Medint syringes and usual disposable 0.2 micron filters
RCB - used old Medint syringes and usual disposable 0.2 micron filters
RWA - water flat, no wind - used old Medint syringes and usual disposable 0.2 micron filters
RNS - steady rain, 0 visibility of Molokai, waves shore break 3-5 feet
RPO - cloudy and rainbow, no rain, waves calm/flat
RKS - rainbow with sprinkles, low cloud over Lanai, no rain, waves 1-2 feet, windy, sunny, frequent swells
